thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net | 6 of 76
thread.title: Tim Akey

author: Tim Akey
title: Tim Akey
text: When I used the USB ISO creator provided it created the iso for usb, but it did not make the usb bootable. Since everything is going USB or Network installs GAMECHEAP needs to provide this type of install more often. With that being said I gave it a four star. I have purchased twice from the provider and the first time was all seamless. I would definitely buy from them again. :)
